nodes.text: A Bazaar Encounter is a scenario for the Star Wars Miniatures Battles game, written by Stephen Crane and published in Imperial Entanglements. It depicts a battle between Rebel troops and some members of the Krayt Draggers swoop gang at a Jawa bazaar, while panicked Jawas scurry around underfoot.
Rebel troops engaging in a bit of R&R at a Jawa bazaar find themselves involved in a little dust-up with some members of the Krayt Draggers swoop gang, while panicked Jawas scurry around underfoot.
